publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5993 Bill Wilson: Hayley Stobo, First Scot to Win a Place at the Bolshoiâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Hayley Stobo from Renfrew on winning a place at the Bolshoi Ballet School; recognises that this is the first time that a Scot has won a place at the prestigious ballet academy; acknowledges the years of hard work that has enabled the young dancer to fulfil her dream, and wishes her well in finding sponsorship to fund her three-year studentship in Moscow. Supported by: Ms Wendy Alexander*, Stuart McMillan*, Willie Coffey*, Cathy Jamieson*, Maureen Watt*, Nigel Don*, Sandra White*, John Wilson*, Bill Butler*, Hugh Henry*, Jim Tolson*, Bill Kidd*, Stewart Maxwell*, Ken Macintosh*
